title: Frequently Asked Questions
summary: Here are some frequently asked questions about me and my work. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact me.

faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: I offer a range of services including Web Development, UI/UX Implementation, Email Marketing, and ensuring Accessibility (ADA Compliance).

faqs.question: What are your proficient technologies?
faqs.answer: I am proficient in HTML, CSS, Scss, Bootstrap, Media Query, Figma to HTML, PSD to HTML, AI to HTML, JavaScript, Litmus, Mailchimp, and ADA Compliance.

faqs.question: What are you familiar with?
faqs.answer: I am familiar with Advance JavaScript.

faqs.question: What tools do you use?
faqs.answer: I use Git & GitHub for version control and VS Code as my primary code editor.

faqs.question: What are your soft skills?
faqs.answer: My soft skills include Problem Solving, Communication, Teamwork & Collaboration, Time Management & Organization, and Adaptability & Learning.

faqs.question: What is your experience as a Software Engineer?
faqs.answer: I am currently a Software Engineer at Funex, where I develop, test, and maintain web pages and applications. I collaborate with designers and developers to ensure our products are responsive, accessible, and optimized.

faqs.question: What kind of projects have you worked on?
faqs.answer: I have worked on a variety of web development projects, including Byzfunder, ThePhix, Gloria Agency, Green Light Finance, and Taxi Transfer.

faqs.question: Are you available for freelance projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, I am open to new opportunities and collaborations, including freelance projects. Please feel free to reach out to me through the contact form.

faqs.question: How can I contact you?
faqs.answer: You can contact me by filling out the contact form on this website, or through my social media links in the footer.

faqs.question: What is your approach to web development?
faqs.answer: I focus on creating responsive, accessible, and optimized web applications. I enjoy collaborating with teams to transform project requirements into high-quality, user-friendly interfaces.

faqs.question: Do you have experience with accessibility (ADA Compliance)?
faqs.answer: Yes, I have experience in ensuring that web pages and web applications are accessible to people with disabilities by adhering to ADA Compliance Standards.

faqs.question: What is your role at Funex?
faqs.answer: As a Software Engineer at Funex, I develop, test, and maintain web pages and applications, ensuring they are responsive, accessible, and optimized. I also collaborate with designers and other developers on project requirements.

faqs.question: Can you describe your experience with front-end development?
faqs.answer: I am a proficient HTML Developer and Front End Developer with strong skills in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. I specialize in creating responsive and accessible web applications and have experience with Figma to HTML conversions.

faqs.question: What is your experience with UI development?
faqs.answer: As a UI Developer, I focus on creating user-friendly interfaces and transforming project requirements into high-quality web pages. I have a strong understanding of UI principles and work to ensure a seamless user experience.

faqs.question: Have you worked with any content management systems (CMS)?
faqs.answer: While my primary focus is on front-end development, I have collaborated with teams working on various platforms, including WordPress and Shopify, by providing high-quality HTML and SCSS.

faqs.question: What is your experience with email marketing?
faqs.answer: I have experience creating and testing responsive email templates for marketing campaigns using tools like Litmus and Mailchimp to ensure cross-platform compatibility.

faqs.question: Can you provide examples of your freelance work?
faqs.answer: Yes, I have worked on freelance projects such as Job Crafter, an education and job placement consultation service. You can find more details in the projects section of my portfolio.

faqs.question: What is your approach to teamwork and collaboration?
faqs.answer: I am a collaborative team player and believe in open communication. I have experience working with designers, developers (including React, WordPress, and Shopify developers), and other stakeholders to deliver high-quality web applications.

faqs.question: How do you stay updated with new technologies?
faqs.answer: I am committed to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with industry trends and best practices. I am always eager to learn and adapt to new technologies to improve my skills and drive innovation.

faqs.question: What is your experience with design tools?
faqs.answer: I am familiar with design tools like Figma and have experience converting Figma designs into pixel-perfect HTML, ensuring that the final product matches the design specifications.

faqs.question: What is your experience with version control?
faqs.answer: I use Git and GitHub for version control to manage my code, collaborate with team members, and track changes in my projects.

faqs.question: What is your experience with React?
faqs.answer: I have experience building responsive and user-friendly web applications with React.js. I am responsible for developing reusable UI components, optimizing website performance, and ensuring SEO-friendly structures.

faqs.question: How do you ensure your websites are responsive and mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: I have a strong focus on responsive web design for both desktop and mobile. I use modern CSS techniques like Flexbox and Bootstrap to create layouts that adapt to different screen sizes.

faqs.question: What is your approach to website optimization and performance?
faqs.answer: I am experienced in optimizing website performance by writing clean and maintainable code, and implementing best practices to ensure fast loading times and a smooth user experience.

faqs.question: Can you work with APIs?
faqs.answer: Yes, I have experience collaborating with teams to implement JSON-based APIs to fetch and display data in web applications.
